title: They Got Played For Fools (Ep 1819)
description:
Biden and his media cronies get busted gaslighting and hilarity ensued. Also, in this episode, I address the massive betrayal by Joe Manchin. He played the GOP for fools. 

News Picks:

Inflation explodes again!


Wikipedia humiliates itself again trying to gaslight for the Biden administration.

Bokhari: Big Tech's Blueprint to Stop a Red Wave in 2022.


Ted Cruz confronts State Dept. chief diversity officer over 'brazen discrimination' — and he brings the proof.

Amid Recession Fears, Economically Free States Continue to Outperform.


Republicans Might Skip Liberal Interviews? Good.
